title: The Carefree Frontier Life Of The Strongest F-Ranked Adventurer
alternative_title: Saikyou F Rank Boukensha no Kimama na Henkyou Seikatsu ; 最強Fランク冒険者の気ままな辺境生活
status: Saikyou F Rank Boukensha no Kimama na Henkyou Seikatsu ; 最強Fランク冒険者の気ままな辺境生活
description:
Description :
        Lumen, a city on the farthest reaches at the edge of the feared magical borderland. Roy is an new F-ranked adventurer that wandered to Lumen on his own whim. Life on this monster-infested outpost should be a harsh burden for a newbie like himhowever, Roy's actually top-class in both swordsmanship and magic?! The sudden appearance of this out-classed "novice" causes havoc in the world, starting in this remote city!
